text: General elections were held in Kenya on 9 August 2022. Voters elected the President, members of the National Assembly and Senate, county governors of Kenya and members of the 47 county assemblies of Kenya. William Ruto was elected President of Kenya, defeating Raila Odinga. ==Presidential candidates== Party/coalition Party/coalition Presidential nominee Most recent political office Image Nominee United Democratic Alliance William Ruto Deputy President (2013–present) Azimio La Umoja Raila Odinga Prime Minister (2008–2013) ==Results== ==Notes== ==References== Category:2022 elections Category:2022 in Africa Category:General elections Category:History of Kenya Category:Politics of Kenya Category:August 2022 events
title: 2022 Kenyan general election
